forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the golden sun presides over a remarkable canvas, painting the sky in deep azure hues, with not a trace of fog or haze to cloud the vision. The current temperature hovers comfortably in the low sixties, beckoning one to savor moments outdoors. Although the warm embrace of sunlight is soothing, a gentle west wind carries with it a noticeable coolness, serving as a subtle reminder of the city's characteristic chill, especially in the afternoon hours when temperatures retreat slightly.

As evening approaches, partly cloudy skies will weave a tranquil tapestry above, allowing dim bursts of twilight to emerge. The evening's low will settle softly around fifty-one degrees, so a light jacket may be your trusted companion for the outdoor strolls this night invites. In these ideal conditions, a walk along the waterfront, perhaps punctuated by a visit to an unassuming café with inviting nooks, can yield delightful moments. Alternatively, an evening spent at an intimate bookstore may offer the solace of a good read, nurturing the spirit as the sun dips below the horizon, leaving traces of orange and gold lingering in the sky.
